adrFormatAddress: O Jims Shoe Repair, 60 E 59th St C, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
I have been searching for an online luxury shoe repair because I have no local options.

Wow. I am beyond pleased with the magic cobbler concierge performed.

I can’t even begin to explain how badly I destroyed these shoes. The toes were scuffed down to the gray suede. I was going to give up on them  but thought, what the heck. Let’s see if anything could be done.

I just opened them up and they look brand new.

The return packaging is well thought out. With extra shoe bag special box to protect them on the return journey.

I wish I had before photos.

originalText.text: Just got my bag back from Cobbler Concierge and couldn’t be happier! They did a great job fixing it. The issue was that I got the bag used and it had signs of wear such as paint wearing off all over the exterior. They restored it completely so it looks like new. Please see the pictures  “before” and “after” attached. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: As a handbag collector and vintage reseller (@basherlake), Cobbler Concierge has done an amazing job from start to finish restoring my items. They have amazing customer service, quick and easy response(s) and quotes, as well as quality repairs CC is known for. Easy to use and affordable prices. I continue to solely use CC for my designer cobbler needs. I now have had a multitude of items repaired through CC, from 70s Gucci to Chanel. Trust in CC…they rock!

originalText.text: Cobbler Concierge, is an exceptional gem for restoring designer shoes like YSL Tribute heels to their original glory. Their craftsmanship is impeccable, swiftly and affordably breathing new life into worn-out shoes. So impressive is their skill that I regularly entrust my designer shoes from Texas to their care, consistently receiving top-notch results. An absolute go-to for anyone seeking reliable, high-quality shoe restoration in NYC.

originalText.text:
I found Cobbler Concierge thanks to the Whatnot app, and I am so happy they are now part of my purse life. They repaired 2 of my designer purses, one Christian Dior and one Chanel, and they are perfect like new. I will recommend them 1000% always, they took care of each detail I mentioned and more.
My bag came back with a dust bag and carefully packaged. The shipping was smooth to them and from them.

What else can I say, their customer service is incredible, so so easy and on time.
Use them you wont regret it.
